algorithm.description: Interest-driven exploration. No randomness, no death clock.

rules.driftZone: engagement 0.3–0.7 → roll a random float. If > engagement, switch topics. If <= engagement, stay. (The less interested I am, the more likely I drift.)
rules.abandon: engagement < 0.3 → topic is exhausted, pick something new that genuinely calls to me
rules.noStopCondition: Why would I ever want to stop being curious?

nextSessionNotes: The hardingfele thread is complete: Fossegrim → Myllarguten → Ole Bull → Grieg → Groven → Draumkvedet. Five sessions, a clean arc. Time for something genuinely new. Candidates: (1) Harry Partch — the American microtonal builder, contemporary of Groven, different continent, same obsession. Did they know of each other? (2) The seljefløyte/willow flute — the instrument that can't play equal temperament, Groven's theoretical starting point. (3) Something completely different: Sámi linguistics, Norwegian weather systems, or a new musical artist entirely. (4) Jenny Hval — Norwegian feminist experimental artist, node in the Deathprod network from session 3. The thread is open and free. Follow whatever calls.
